body_html:
Oh hm, I thought I fixed that weeks ago too, glad to hear I didn't miss this one. We don't have a lot of 'not implemented' tests, which is what would be needed to test this case -- one could register the kernels for Tshape if desired, we just haven't gotten around to adding them + tests.

We haven't backported a lot of changes into 0.x releases, but I suspect we'll do so once we hit 1.0.
body_text:
Oh hm, I thought I fixed that weeks ago too, glad to hear I didn't miss this one.  We don't have a lot of 'not implemented' tests, which is what would be needed to test this case -- one could register the kernels for Tshape if desired, we just haven't gotten around to adding them + tests.
We haven't backported a lot of changes into 0.x releases, but I suspect we'll do so once we hit 1.0.
body:
Oh hm, I *thought* I fixed that weeks ago too, glad to hear I didn't miss this one.  We don't have a lot of 'not implemented' tests, which is what would be needed to test this case -- one could register the kernels for Tshape<int64> if desired, we just haven't gotten around to adding them + tests.

We haven't backported a lot of changes into 0.x releases, but I suspect we'll do so once we hit 1.0.
